verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God is good to me, Oh what love I see Jesus as the Lamb was slain. He delivered me, cleansed and set me free, Lord of all, He rose again!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now I live, yet not I, Jesus is the life in me. Sending His spiritâ€™s flame, Showers of latter rain, God has poured His love on me.{/lang-eng}
